Class AlienBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.ElementsBoard
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.AlienBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AlienBoard extends ElementsBoard
This class offers the capacity to change the number of aliens held on a tile. The maximum number of aliens in a board is only 1.
See Also:

    • AlienBoard

      public AlienBoard(TilesBoard tiles, AlienBoard.Type type)
      Create the Alien Layer for a single type of alien.
      Parameters:
      tiles - tiles placement to check if the alien will be placed in their corresponding tile-coordinate.
      type - of this alien layer.

  • Method Details

    • thereIsAddon

      public static boolean thereIsAddon(Coordinate c, TilesBoard tiles, Tile.Type type)
      Checks if there is an addon of the specified type in the tiles adjacent to the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      c - central coordinate
      Returns:
      true if an adjacent tile contains an addon of the specified type, false otherwise

    • cantPlace

      public boolean cantPlace(Coordinate c, int qty)
      Check if the Alien can be placed at the corresponding coordinate. It checks if there is an addon of the corresponding color near and if there is only 1 alien of this color in the entire board.
      Specified by:
      cantPlace in class ElementsBoard
      Parameters:
      c - the coordinate to check if the alien can be placed here.
      qty - how many aliens, only 1 can be placed per alien.
      Returns:
      true if the alien is playable, false if not.

    • getColor

      public com.googlecode.lanterna.TextColor.ANSI getColor()
      Get the ansi color of the corresponding alien, used for terminal drawing.
      Specified by:
      getColor in class ElementsBoard
      Returns:
      the ansi color in base of the alien type.
